line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: plugin.zanzal.shopping.buyware
* DESCRIPTION: Buy $wares.list at $station or sector if
* $use.drones is true.
* AUTHOR: Zanzal DATE: 28 December 2013
* NOTE: Shopping commands assume that the list has been pre-approved
* in terms of cargo space or ware size. Still lets double check. This is
* all or none here. The main problem here is that loading via drones is
* done in asynchronously which makes it hard to predict what might
* happen along the way.
* display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - no wares in $wares.list.' duration=14000 ms
* We're going to prune this up so lets make a copy of it
* Sanity check: Lets make sure the wares we've been told to buy can actually be carried.
* display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - wares quantity exceeds space available' duration=14000 ms
* display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - asked to buy a ware that we cant transport.' duration=14000 ms
* display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - wares total quantity exceeds space available' duration=14000 ms
* End of sanity check, from this point on our return value is based on whether any purchase was successful.
* The caller told us to do the buying with drones
* But we don't have any.
* FATAL ERROR - No freight drones left - something probably killed them.
* Check to see if drones successful.
* Dock and buy wares that are on our wares list
* end $qty > 0
* can buy at this station
* end for loop
* Failed to dock to the station
* $price = a negative value indicating amount spent of $ware
* This is specific to the droneminer. We log its shopping costs.

sval.val: SCRIPT NAME: plugin.zanzal.shopping.buyware
DESCRIPTION: Buy $wares.list at $station or sector if
$use.drones is true.
AUTHOR: Zanzal DATE: 28 December 2013
NOTE: Shopping commands assume that the list has been pre-approved
in terms of cargo space or ware size. Still lets double check. This is
all or none here. The main problem here is that loading via drones is
done in asynchronously which makes it hard to predict what might
happen along the way.
display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - no wares in $wares.list.' duration=14000 ms
We're going to prune this up so lets make a copy of it
Sanity check: Lets make sure the wares we've been told to buy can actually be carried.
display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - wares quantity exceeds space available' duration=14000 ms
display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - asked to buy a ware that we cant transport.' duration=14000 ms
display subtitle text: text='DMS: Buy ware error - wares total quantity exceeds space available' duration=14000 ms
End of sanity check, from this point on our return value is based on whether any purchase was successful.
The caller told us to do the buying with drones
But we don't have any.
FATAL ERROR - No freight drones left - something probably killed them.
Check to see if drones successful.
Dock and buy wares that are on our wares list
end $qty > 0
can buy at this station
end for loop
Failed to dock to the station
$price = a negative value indicating amount spent of $ware
This is specific to the droneminer. We log its shopping costs.
